heading.default: We Back the Brightest and Help Them Scale

text.default: R136 works with creative entrepreneurs to scale their mid-to-late stage startups with a unique blend of expertise and experience that unlocks their potential. Many of us have been CEOs, CTOs and c-level execs at corporations and young companies – we’ve done this before. We help shape your vision, strategy, execution and talent. Our partners managed more than $400 million in assets and have funded more than 30 companies.
